rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0001
rows.name: It was 30 years ago when Elma first came to Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0003
rows.name:
A war was being waged between the interstellar federation
the Ganglion belonged to and another alien civilization,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0004
rows.name: and Elma knew that eventually, that war would come to Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0005
rows.name: She came to our planet, alone, to save us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0006
rows.name:
She convinced those in power,
like Secretary Nagi, that the threat was real,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0007
rows.name:
and helped put into motion a grand plan
to preserve all of mankind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Her alien tech brought us Skells
so we could defend ourselves...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0009
rows.name: It gave us light-speed travel, to ensure our escape...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0010
rows.name: And it led to mimeosomes, to facilitate our survival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0011
rows.name:
None of this would have been possible for centuries
without the help we received from Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0012
rows.name: Everyone says the Earth died that day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0013
rows.name: But not meâ€”I don't believe it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0014
rows.name:
The White Whale couldn't have been the only ark to
escape, either. There must be other survivors out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0016
rows.name:
The path ahead may not be clear,
and it certainly won't be easy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0017
rows.name:
But for now, the important thing is
we're here on Mira, and we're ALIVE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0018
rows.name:
And we'll live on, for now,
with faith in our hearts that one day,[ST:page p1=135 ]we can once again set out
to search for the planet we left behind...[ST:wait ]
